subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The games at Baruch College in New York are jazzed by a wise-cracking commentator who bestows nicknames on players, some of whom are N.B.A. players.
snippet: The games at Baruch College in New York are jazzed by a wise-cracking commentator who bestows nicknames on players, some of whom are N.B.A. players.
